title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 658.19 - Waiver of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 658.19 - Waiver of rules

State Regulations

Any of the foregoing rules may be waived by stipulation
of the parties concerned with the consent of the commissioner. If a hearing has
been convened, such a waiver or stipulation shall require the consent of the
hearing officer. The commissioner, or the hearing officer acting in his behalf, may waive any of the aforesaid rules; provided, however, he shall not waive
those rules pertaining to the service of notice of hearing and service of the
final order and determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
658.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
